name: Tianlong Dahaize Coal Mine
company_mentions: Inner Mongolia Shendong Tianlong Group Co., Ltd.

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. The Tianlong Dahaize Coal Mine is a state-owned coal mine located in the Loess Plateau region of Shaanxi province, specifically in Yulin City, Shenmu City, Daliuta Town

operators: Inner Mongolia Shendong Tianlong Group Co., Ltd.
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Inner Mongolia Shendong Tianlong Group, which is a subsidiary of China Energy.
